CustomField.formula: if(NOT(ISBLANK(Contact__c)), Contact__r.Phone & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Contact__r.Phone_Ext__c)), ' x' & Contact__r.Phone_Ext__c, ''), IF(NOT(ISBlANK(Account__c)), Account__r.Phone & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Account__r.Phone_Ext__c)), ' x' & Account__r.Phone_Ext__c, ''), ''))
CustomField.label: Phone
